QuestData.Title: The Cursed Remains
QuestData.Description: There are remaining beings here that pose a direct threat to us ever reclaiming this sacred city. Magister Kalendris and Illyana Ravenoak are both extremely dangerous and need to be disposed of as quickly as possible.$B$BExercise caution, for with there being so few remaining feeding off of Immol'thar's energies, they are likely to be stronger than they first appear.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Magister Kalendris and Illyana Ravenoak.
QuestData.RewardText: Your dedication will make this all that much easier.
